strongs_def: to lie down to rest, i.e. (by implication) to fall asleep (literally or figuratively)
outline:
1. to fall asleep, drop off to sleep
  2. to sleep
    1. to sleep normally
    2. euphemistically, to be dead
    3. metaph.
      1. to yield to sloth and sin
      2. to be indifferent to one's salvation
